Author: akita13
Text: Showered together with a girl I went out with and she was so goddamn perfect. Perfect shoulders, prominent collarbones, skinny arms, flat stomach stretched across her hip bones, tight thighs with a huge gap, smooth and firm butt. And her boobs were bigger than mine too, despite being like at least 6kgs lighter than me. She was a literal model and that's when I realised that I'm literally a lumpy disproportionate ugly bitch lol!

Author: daintyyeo
Text: yea, in the beginning of high school one of the students asked the teacher to explain the word petite, and she explained it and named 2 of the students in my class for example, i was fuming asking myself why she didnt think about me, that was the biggest trigger in my life. those girls are about the same height as me
